content: fasten_off and weave in end finally use about 6 inches of nose color pink is fairly universal and grey works well for black cats and siamese to make a nose roughly one stitch wide just below the eyes picture a picture b # for siamese cats use white or cream for the main color mc and grey or brown for the accents ac bobbles tail and top/ear portion #row 9 mc-ch1 decrease ac- sc8 mc-decrease decrease ac-sc8 mc- decrease join #row 10-11 work normally using only ac
